options.content:
♻️Code Green 能源監控總覽

本儀表板使用 AI 模型監控系統效能。請按照以下步驟進行操作與分析：

📌 儀表板操作指引

區域/目的 操作重點
篩選器調整 調整 時間範圍 及頂部 變數 ($device_id / $location)，鎖定監控目標。
快速警示 關注 異常事件總數 / 異常率。面板 亮紅/橘色 即需注意。
趨勢分析 趨勢圖上的 垂直標記 (Annotation) 為異常發生點。
異常詳情 查閱底部表格。背景顏色越深，代表異常判斷的信心分數越高。

# 每張圖都要加 設備的變數/地區的變數/時間篩選變數,才能在左上和右上篩選哪台設備/地區/時間,變數在右上點setting-->variable
# 可以參考總筆數的query(WHERE下面)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) AS "設備數"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND location IN ($location);

SELECT
    cel.scope_id AS "設備 ID",          -- 直接使用 scope_id 作為設備標示
    SUM(cel.co2_kg_delta) AS "總碳排放量 (kg)" -- 計算碳排總和
FROM
    carbon_usage_log cel             -- ★ 使用您確認存在的表名
WHERE
    $__timeFilter(cel.timestamp_utc) AND -- ★ 時間範圍篩選
    cel.scope_type = 'device' AND      -- ★ 只篩選 device 類型
    cel.scope_id IN ($device_id)       -- ★ 直接使用 $device_id 篩選 scope_id
GROUP BY
    cel.scope_id                     -- ★ 按設備 ID (scope_id) 分組
ORDER BY
    "總碳排放量 (kg)" DESC;           -- 讓碳排最高的排前面 (可選)

SELECT

  COUNT(*) AS "資料總筆數"

FROM

  energy_cleaned

WHERE

  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND -- Grafana 時間範圍篩選

  device_id IN ($device_id) AND -- Grafana 設備篩選變數

  location IN ($location);      -- Grafana 地區篩選變數

SELECT
  system_power_watt AS "系統總功耗 (W)"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND location IN ($location)
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  SUM(system_power_watt) AS "總耗電 (W)"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND location IN ($location)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id);

-- 偵錯用：只執行內層查詢
SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id)
    device_id,       -- 我加上了 device_id 和時間，方便您查看
    timestamp_utc,
    cpu_power_watt
FROM
    energy_cleaned
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(created_at) AND 
    device_id IN ($device_id) AND 
    location IN ($location)
ORDER BY
    device_id, timestamp_utc DESC;

SELECT
    AVG(gpu_power_watt) AS "result"
FROM (
    -- 內層查詢：為每個 device_id 找出最新的一筆紀錄
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_id)
        gpu_power_watt
    FROM
        energy_cleaned
    WHERE 
        $__timeFilter(created_at) AND 
        device_id IN ($device_id) AND 
        location IN ($location)
    ORDER BY
        device_id, timestamp_utc DESC -- 必須和 DISTINCT ON 欄位匹配，並依時間排序
) AS latest_per_device;

SELECT
  memory_used_mb AS "記憶體使用量 (MB)"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND location IN ($location)
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  disk_read_mb_s AS "磁碟讀取速率 (MB/s)"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND location IN ($location)
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  disk_write_mb_s AS "磁碟寫入速率 (MB/s)"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND location IN ($location)
ORDER BY created_at DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created_at, 1m),
  AVG(system_power_watt) AS "平均系統功率 (W)"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND location IN ($location)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

panels.title: LSTM預測趨勢圖 (動態裝置篩選)
API 用戶端錯誤率 (HTTP 4xx Errors)

panels.description: 根據 LSTM 預測功耗，提供即時運營指導。

1.text: 低功耗預測 🟢 (執行模型訓練或數據備份)

2.text: 中等功耗預測 🟡 (持續監控，維持現有運營效率)

3.text: 高負載預測 🚨  (立即執行負載分流/降頻)

panels.title: AI 策略燈號與行動建議

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  device_id AS "設備 ID",
  count(*) AS "異常次數"
FROM
  energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at) AND
  location IN ($location) AND
  is_anomaly = TRUE
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 2 DESC
-- LIMIT 10 (可選，僅顯示前 10 名)

SELECT
  device_id AS "設備ID",
  CASE
    WHEN is_anomaly = TRUE THEN '🔴異常 (Abnormal)'
    ELSE '🟢正常 (Normal)'
  END AS "狀態",
  created_at AS "最後更新時間"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE (device_id, created_at) IN (
  SELECT device_id, MAX(created_at)
  FROM energy_cleaned
  WHERE $__timeFilter(created_at)
  GROUP BY device_id
)
AND location IN ($location)
ORDER BY device_id;

SELECT
  SUM(CASE WHEN is_anomaly = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "正常筆數 (Normal Count)",
  SUM(CASE WHEN is_anomaly = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "異常筆數 (Abnormal Count)"
FROM
  energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND location IN ($location);

panels.title: 異常與正常資料總比例

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  timestamp_utc AS "時間",
  device_id AS "設備ID",
  gpu_model AS "GPU 型號",
  cpu_power_watt AS "CPU 功耗 (W)",
  gpu_power_watt AS "GPU 功耗 (W)",
  memory_used_mb AS "記憶體使用量 (MB)",
  disk_read_mb_s AS "磁碟讀取速率 (MB/s)",
  disk_write_mb_s AS "磁碟寫入速率 (MB/s)",
  system_power_watt AS "系統總功耗 (W)",
  anomaly_reason AS "異常原因"
FROM energy_cleaned
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created_at)
  AND device_id IN ($device_id)
  AND location IN ($location)
  AND is_anomaly = true
ORDER BY timestamp_utc DESC;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM energy_cleaned ORDER BY device_id;
list.label: 選擇設備
list.name: device_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM energy_cleaned ORDER BY device_id;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT location FROM energy_cleaned ORDER BY location;
list.label: 選擇地區
list.name: location
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT location FROM energy_cleaned ORDER BY location;
